entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
